name: kaggle_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Kaggle in parallel. Pass comma-separated queries. Returns results from each query.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const seen = new Set(); document.querySelectorAll('a[href]').forEach(a => { const href = a.getAttribute('href') || ''; if (seen.has(href) || !href.startsWith('/')) return; const isMatch = href.match(/^\/(?:datasets|competitions|code|models)\/[^/]+(?:\/[^/]+)?/); if (!isMatch) return; const title = a.textContent.trim(); if (!title || title.length > 200 || title.length < 3) return; seen.add(href); results.push({ title: title.substring(0, 200), url: 'https://www.kaggle.com' + href }); }); return { result_count: results.length, results: results.slice(0, 10) };
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract search results
